bill.title: Students with disabilities; parents shall receive copy of outside evaluation and observation report, etc.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-23-137, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require That Parents Of Students With Disabilities Shall Be Provided A Copy Of An Outside Entity's Assessment/evaluation And Observation Report; To Require That Parents Of A Child With A Disability Will Be Provided With A Copy Of Their Child's Initial Or Reevaluation Assessment Report Before An Iep Meeting; To Require That Parents Of Students With Disabilities Shall Be Provided A Copy Of Their Child's Alternate Assessment Scores At No Cost; To Provide That Parents Of Students With Disabilities Have The Option Of Tape Recording Their Child's Iep Meeting; To Amend Section 37-23-139, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Findings And Decisions Of The State Department Of Education Office Of Special Education Relative To A Parental Complaint Shall Be Forwarded To Each Member Of The Local School Board; To Revise Complaint Procedures To Require That Parents Of Students With Disabilities Shall Receive Certain Response Information; To Bring Forward Section 37-23-143, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Revises The Time Limitation For Bringing A Civil Action With Respect To A Student With Disabilities Due Process Hearing; And For Related Purposes.
